title: Cairn India says merger with parent Vedanta is on track
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Jul 21, 2015, 10:24 BST - UK Markets close in 6 hrs 6 mins Cairn India says merger with parent Vedanta is on track Reuters - UK Focus – 1 hour 7 minutes ago 162.90 -4.60 
MUMBAI, July 21 (Reuters) - Cairn India Chief Executive Mayank Ashar said on Tuesday the firm's proposed merger with parent Vedanta Ltd was "on track", brushing off reported demands from some minority shareholders for a higher price. 
Shareholders in Cairn India, the country's largest private sector crude oil producer, are to get one share in mining giant Vedanta and one redeemable preference share under a $2.3 billion deal to buy out minorities announced in June.
